channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon doc exposes ‘neglect and pain’ in many nursing homes. What can be done?
Market's rebound to be tested by inflation reports as stagflation threat emerges
Nvidia, AMD shares lower on report to give U.S. a cut of China sales
Democrats slam GOP redistricting fight as 'cheating' as Texas Gov. Abbott threatens arrests
item.description: Democratic lawmakers said the party has "got to fight back" against the redistricting effort in Texas.

item.title: Europe stresses need to protect Ukrainian interests ahead of Trump-Putin talks
item.description: European officials presented their own Ukraine peace proposals to the U.S. as Trump prepared for talks with Putin on ending the war.

item.title: U.S. stock futures inch higher ahead of inflation reports this week
Nvidia, AMD reportedly will give U.S. government 15% of its China chip revenues
Trump warns homeless to leave Washington, D.C., ‘immediately’
item.description: President Donald Trump's remarks come as he has increased his rhetoric about countering crime in the District in recent days.

item.title: Trump to speak at White House on violent crime in D.C. amid federal crackdown
item.description: President Donald Trump ramped up his rhetoric about crime in Washington, D.C., after a former member of DOGE was assaulted in an attempted carjacking.

item.title: Bessent leads a broad search for Fed chair that includes Bullard and Sumerlin: Reuters
item.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent is leading a search for a successor to Fed Chair Jerome Powell, a source familiar with the process told Reuters.
